00002 ! Subroutine : PostCollisionF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00032 
00033  SUBROUTINE PostCollisionF
00034 
00035 ! Common Variables
00036  USE Domain,    ONLY : xl_f, xlg_f, xsize_f, xu_f, xug_f, yl_f, ylg_f, ysize_f, yu_f, yug_f
00037  USE LBMParams, ONLY : fcol
00038  USE MPIParams
00039  USE MPI
00040  IMPLICIT NONE
00041 
00042 ! Local Variables
00043  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00044  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00045  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00046 
00047 
00048 !-------- Save data for inward f components ------------------------------------
00049 ! X DIRECTION
00050  count = 1
00051  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00052    f_west_snd(count) = fcol(xl_f,j,1)
00053    f_east_snd(count) = fcol(xu_f,j,3)
00054    count = count + 1
00055  END DO
00056 
00057 ! Y DIRECTION
00058  count = 1
00059  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00060    f_south_snd(count) = fcol(i,yl_f,2)
00061    f_north_snd(count) = fcol(i,yu_f,4)
00062    count = count + 1
00063  END DO
00064 
00065 
00066 !-------- Exchange information using MPI calls ---------------------------------
00067 ! X DIRECTION
00068  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00069  CALL MPI_SEND( f_west_snd, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00070  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00071 
00072  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00073  CALL MPI_SEND( f_east_snd, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00074  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00075 
00076 ! Y DIRECTION
00077  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00078  CALL MPI_SEND( f_south_snd, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00079  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00080 
00081  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00082  CALL MPI_SEND( f_north_snd, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00083  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00084 
00085 
00086 !-------- Update outward pointing f components for the ghosts ------------------
00087 ! x direction
00088  count = 1
00089  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00090    fcol(xug_f,j,1) = f_east_rcv(count)
00091    fcol(xlg_f,j,3) = f_west_rcv(count)
00092    count = count + 1
00093  END DO
00094 
00095 ! y direction
00096  count = 1
00097  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00098    fcol(i,yug_f,2) = f_north_rcv(count)
00099    fcol(i,ylg_f,4) = f_south_rcv(count)
00100    count = count + 1
00101  END DO
00102 
00103  RETURN
00104  END SUBROUTINE PostCollisionF
00105
